thread.title: Kushner Spokesman Josh Raffel Is Set to Leave White House

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Kushner Spokesman Josh Raffel Is Set to Leave White House
text:
WASHINGTON—Senior White House adviser Jared Kushner’s spokesman is leaving the White House, administration officials said Tuesday, becoming the latest official to depart the West Wing.
Josh Raffel was first hired last spring to serve as a spokesman for the Office of American Innovation, a White House office headed by Mr. Kushner that was assigned the task of replicating private-sector efficiency inside the federal government.
His... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
